name: @kentico/kontent-backup-manager
description: This utility enables backup & restore of Kentico Kontent projects
author: Richard Sustek

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run ts-lint:check && npm run build:all
scripts.build:all: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es5 && npm run build:es2015
scripts.test:backup: npm run build:cjs && cd output && node ../dist/cjs/lib/node/cli/app --config=backup-config.json
scripts.test:clean: npm run build:cjs && cd output && node ../dist/cjs/lib/node/cli/app --config=clean-config.json
scripts.test:restore: npm run build:cjs && cd output && node ../dist/cjs/lib/node/cli/app --config=restore-config.json
